TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputCacheProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection

Docs.summary: Represents the collection of output-cache providers that are configured for a Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The collection of configured output-cache providers does not include the default provider for the ASP.NET in-memory output cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProviderCollection> constructor initializes the hash-table object that is used by the output cache provider to store the items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase provider) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inserts a provider into the collection of output-cache providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProviderCollection.Add%2A> method adds only providers that are specified in the configuration for a Web site. Therefore, it does not add the ASP.NET default provider for the in-memory output cache.
This collection is read-only. It is populated one time based on the providers that are specified in configuration. After the collection is populated, you cannot modify the set of available providers.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection The array must have zero-based indexing.
The point in the array where the copying starts.
Docs.summary: Copies the output-cache providers to a compatible one-dimensional array at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The array into which the items are copied must have a zero-based index.

Docs.param: The name of a provider in the collection.
Docs.summary: Returns a reference to the named output-cache provider in the collection.
